Version: 1.1.0
Date: 2020-11-28
  Changes:
    - Added support for 1.1.0
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 1.0.1
Date: 2020-09-18
  Changes:
    - Enable High Pressure Offshore Pump, HP Omnic-Water
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 1.0.0
Date: 2020-09-09
  Changes:
    - Added High Pressure Offshore Pump,  runs slower than a normal pump, but outputs high pressure water directly.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.0.4
Date: 2020-07-08
  Changes:
    - Added some loading dependencies
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.0.3
Date: 2020-06-12
  Features:
    - Added HP icon to barrels to help tell them apart from normal barrels :)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.0.2
Date: 2020-05-19
  Features:
    - Allow to work in space (space exploration 0.3.x)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version: 0.0.1
Date: 2020-04-24
  Features:
    - First release
